isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - ANTILOCK AIR BRAKE SYSTEM WITH TRACTION CONTROL: BENDIX - 9200, 9300 and 9400 - INSTALLATION - ANTILOCK RELAY VALVE

step1.para: After noting the relationship of the positioning marks made during removal, position the gasket on the controller, then secure the controller to the antilock relay valve using the 4 capscrews. Tighten the cap screws to 50 to 80 In-lbs. (5.6 to 9.0 N·m).
Install all air line fittings and plugs (as marked during removal) making certain thread sealing material does not enter the valve.
Install the assembled controller/relay valve assembly on the vehicle in the position marked during removal.
Connect all air lines and wiring cables to the valve and controller assembly using the identification made during valve removal.
After installing the valve and controller assembly, test all air fittings for excessive leakage and tighten as needed.
